titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Defense to adopt centralized procedures for providing notice to victims and witnesses of the status of prisoners in military correctional facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

bill.summary: 6/23/1993--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of Defense to prescribe procedures and implement a centralized system for providing notice of the status of offenders confined in military correctional facilities to witnesses and victims.
